titleStmt.title: The case of Katherine Harris a Protestant sufferer; whose husband was barbarously murdered the 26th of March, 1687. by the Earl of Clincarty ...

notesStmt.note: The House of Commons journal, 19 May 1701, mentions a petition by "Catharine Harris, alias Kiff" on this matter.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
